dt-option.name: searchPanes.panes.options.value
dt-option.summary: Define the value for an option of a custom pane

type.description: The `-init searchPanes.panes.value` is the string that will be displayed to the user for the custom option in the pane.

dt-option.default: The default value of `-init searchPanes.panes.options.value` is undefined as custom panes must be externally defined.
dt-option.description:
As standard, the value of the `value` is undefined.
Setting `-init searchPanes.panes.options.value` to function allows searchpanes to use that function to search for results from the DataTable. Returning `true` from the function will include that row in the results, conversely `false` will exclude the row.
Having the `value` property as a function means that comparisons can be made at a variety of different levels of complexity, all completely open to the developers needs.
